root.message: The COMPARABILITY field for indicator 4-6-1, translated into en
root.data:
This indicator reflects part of the global level indicator “Proportion of population in a given age group achieving at least a fixed level of proficiency in functional (a) literacy and (b) numeracy skills, by sex”. Comparing the content of Vietnam and global indicators, there are differences as follows:

International Indicator

Vietnam indicator

Skill

Can read, write and do math

Can read and write

Split

- Age group

- Gender

- Disability

- Location

- Income

- Skill Type

- Ethnic group ( Kinh and other ethnic groups);

- Urban/rural;

- Province/city directly under the Central Government.

Data source

Adult skills assessment survey (eg PIAAC, STEP, LAMP, RAMAA) and adult literacy survey at the national level.

- Population and housing census;

- Census midterm;

- Population change and family planning survey.
